profileAlternative.name: Kathan Patel
profileAlternative.headline: Software Development Test Engineer, Autonomous Car at Extron | MS in Computer Engineering, SJSU
profileAlternative.summary:
MS Computer Engineering student at San Jose State University looking for full-time opportunity in the field of Embedded Firmware.


My core skills include:
• C
• C++
• Python
• Embedded Systems
• Operating System
• Real-time Operating System (RTOS)
• Firmware Design
• Algorithm Design and Analysis
• Neural Networks
• Robotics
• Computer Vision (fundamentals)





I am authorized to work for any employer in USA.
If you have any suitable position, I’d encourage you to contact me at kathanpatel15195@gmail.com

positions.title: Software Development Test Engineer, Autonomous Car
Deep Learning and Computer Vision Intern
Instructional Student Assistant
positions.description: I am instructional student assistant for undergrad course "Assembly language programming" in Computer Engineering department. My duties include assessing the submissions of students' works like assignments, homework and projects, update students' scores and assist professor in lab sessions.

positions.title: Vice Chair at IEEE Student Branch, LDCE
positions.description: Being a committee member my main responsibility was to assist Branch Chair in organizing the seminars, workshops, expert lectures and other events that the committee planned in the best interest of the students.

positions.title: Student Trainee
positions.description: The training program consisted of enhancing the employability skills of the students in the telecom and networking domain. I got to know the structure of telecom system, digital switching, transmission system, communication and networking. Throughout the process my presentation delivering skills also improved....
